description: Measures the prevalence of nullFlavor codes across an entire C-CDA
bestPractice: High-quality data are *coded* data. Codes should codes, not 'nullFlavor'

grades.A: > 90% of codes have a non-null value
grades.B: > 80% of codes have a non-null value
grades.C: > 70% of codes have a non-null value
grades.D: > 60% of codes have a non-null value
grades.F: < 60% of codes have a non-null value
grades.N/A: No codes or nullFlavor used in the entire document. Unlikely...
